song_lyric:
作曲 : 谭维维/Julian Emery/刘迦宁/Dominic Craik
 作词 : 尹约
A thousand voices in my head
An iceberg burning in my veins
A thousand miles waiting ahead
I need to breathe,
 need to break all chains
Take my hand and go away (Take my hand and go away)
In this fleeting world (Take my hand and go away)
We all lose control (Take my hand and go away)
Of our broken souls (Take my hand and go away)
Four horsemen
They have appeared
This is it
The end of it,
 dark abyss,
 the Apocalypse
Take my hand and go away (Take my hand and go away)
Tear the world apart (Take my hand and go away)
Against all falling stars (Take my hand and go away)
Soaring in the sky (Take my hand and go away)
Up high
Take my hand and go away (Take my hand and go away)
Tear the world apart (Take my hand and go away)
Against all falling stars (Take my hand and go away)
Soaring in the sky (Take my hand and go away)
